name: Pirate No Pirate! VR
description: Experience VR experience at sea aboard your own pirate ship! Pirate no Pirate! is the official VR Game for wannabe the pirate on the VR Headset (Oculus Rift, HTC Vive). Pick up your Gun with First-person VR puzzlers make for an easy transition into VR, but intelligently incorporating the platform itself as a puzzle mechanic isn't so simple.
